body: If only Hana Hook would make something wholesome about an young boy and a married woman, then it'll be perfection
Check out URE-011 for the live action version of this story.... INCLUDING that ending!
Wow well props to the kid for not being a dick and stealing Takashi's mom. Way too used to this artist destroying little kid's souls in their work through their mother being taken by others
Bro his mom talking shit to him like that reminded me how fucked my fam treated me. It feels so good ♡. Not down with the scat tho
This just my Willy flaccid in seconds into reading this
Oh look, some normie got butthurt reading this NTR doujin lol
At least he is a nice guy and a good friend in this story
Kenta again :v what's the matter with him =_=
Oh look a piece of shitty garbage by a shitty author :)
Hana hook getting predictable,same shit different character,get it same ahit wink wink..

So this was the prequel of the other story. This is how Takashi got like that. Well I hate Kenta, in every story I saw him in. But at the very least, Takashi and his mom are happy at the end and the mom doesn't betray him :D So it's not all sad.

Even if this doujinshi is just fiction, it means something that thecharacter have some belieable reactions otherwise it is a joke not a sad story. The problem with this netorare (and many of them) is not that your main character are betrayed by his most important people (girlfriend, mother, dauther or wife), the problem is his lack of reaction. I know tha what i called problem it is something that represent netorare but i think it would be more enjoyable and with better stories if the main character react as someone normally do (with anger in most cases, violence or in some greater situation with a master plan for revenge, and i dont say that it has to be a hapy end or that he win in the end but at least that he tried).
